featured.text: They 37 as a funeral offering shown upon the altars of the gods.
32 Food offerings are presented at house altars and temples.

definition.zh_def: 祭壇，通常用於宗教儀式或崇拜活動的地方。
definition.en_def: A raised structure used for religious rituals or worship.
definition.example: The priest placed the offerings on the altar during the ceremony.
